Description: Immunotherapy target marker: PD1_PDL1_CTLA4, Kong J H, et al. Nature communications, 2022, 13(1): 3703.
Single target marker CTLA4
Single target marker PDCD1
Single target marker CD274
CD8Tcell_sc (Average expression of CD8A + CD8B)
Davoli cytotoxic immune signature (Averaging the expression levels of cytotoxic immune signature genes)
Fehrenbacher T-effector-IFN-y signature (Averaging the expression levels of T-effector IFN-γ signature genes)
Freeman gene pair developed from long /short OS
Averaging the expression levels of neoadjuvant response signature (NRS) genes (including genes involved in T cell activation, adaptive immune response, and T cell migration )

IFNG signature Ayers et al. JCI 2017. After performance of quantile normalization, a log10 transformation was applied, and signature scores were calculated by averaging of the included genes for the IFN-γ (6-gene) and expanded immune (18-gene) signatures.

Expanded immune gene signature, Ayers et al. JCI 2017.  After performance of quantile normalization, a log10 transformation was applied, and signature scores were calculated by averaging of the included genes for the IFN-γ (6-gene) and expanded immune (18-gene) signatures.
Auslander IMPRES gene 1 (Sum of ratios of 15 checkpoint or immune gene pairs)
Auslander IMPRES gene 2 (Sum of ratios of 15 checkpoint or immune gene pairs)
Cytotoxic T lymphocytes markers (CTLs, averaging the expression levels of signature genes)
Tumor-associated macrophages(TAMs, averaging the expression levels of signature genes)
T-cell exhaustion Pos (Texh, averaging the expression levels of signature genes)
Messina 12-chemokine signature (Principal component 1 score from PCA of expression levels of 12 chemokine signature genes)
Cancer-associated fibroblasts (CAFs, averaging the expression levels of signature genes )
Roh immune score (Averaging the expression levels of immune genes)
Rooney immune cytolytic activity (Averaging the expression levels of granzyme A (GZMA) and perforin (PRF1)
MHC I association immunoscore based on 100 genes
The T cell-inflamed GEP score of a sample was calculated as the ssGSEA normalized enrichment score of the 18 inflammatory gene for the sample
the top 200 genes with highest influence scores as ICI target-proximal genes
